==Dialogue==
===Friendly Fracas===
{{Dialogue start}}
;(Talk to Cyno)
:{{A|vo card cyno invite easy 01.ogg}} '''Cyno:''' Then let us begin.
:{{DIcon}} Let's play Genius Invokation TCG.
:;(Open Genius Invokation TCG match interface)
:{{DIcon}} Adjust the deck first...
:;(Open Genius Invokation TCG deck interface)
:{{DIcon}} I've got other things to do right now...

;(When the player defeats one of Cyno's Character Cards)
:{{A|vo card cyno ingame easy 02.ogg}} '''Cyno:''' Good judgement call.

;(When the player defeats two of Cyno's Character Cards)
:{{A|vo card cyno ingame easy 03.ogg}} '''Cyno:''' You have spirit.

;(When Cyno defeats one of the player's Character Cards)
:{{A|vo card cyno ingame easy 01.ogg}} '''Cyno:''' Don't get cocky.

;(When Cyno uses an Elemental Burst)
:{{A|vo card cyno ingame easy 04.ogg}} '''Cyno:''' This ends now!

;(If the player loses the match)
:{{A|vo card cyno invite easy 02.ogg}} '''Cyno:''' That was an enjoyable game.

;(If the player wins the match)
:{{A|vo card cyno invite easy 03.ogg}} '''Cyno:''' It's not like me to make mistakes like this...
{{Dialogue end}}

===Serious Showdown===
{{Dialogue start}}
;(Talk to Cyno)
:{{A|vo card cyno invite hard 01.ogg}} '''Cyno:''' It's time to duel!
:{{DIcon}} Let's play Genius Invokation TCG.
:;(Open Genius Invokation TCG match interface)
:{{DIcon}} Adjust the deck first...
:;(Open Genius Invokation TCG deck interface)
:{{DIcon}} I've got other things to do right now...

;(When the player defeats one of Cyno's Character Cards)
:{{A|vo card cyno ingame hard 02.ogg}} '''Cyno:''' Interesting... But insufficient.

;(When the player defeats two of Cyno's Character Cards)
:{{A|vo card cyno ingame hard 03.ogg}} '''Cyno:''' ...It's not over till it's over!

;(When Cyno defeats one of the player's Character Cards)
:{{A|vo card cyno ingame hard 01.ogg}} '''Cyno:''' The first of many.

;(When Cyno uses an Elemental Burst)
:{{A|vo card cyno ingame hard 04.ogg}} '''Cyno:''' I sentence you to defeat!

;(If the player loses the match)
:{{A|vo card cyno invite hard 02.ogg}} '''Cyno:''' Victory is mine!

;(If the player wins the match)
:{{A|vo card cyno invite hard 03.ogg}} '''Cyno:''' Why was I so careless...
{{Dialogue end}}
